name: Diya India Foundation

address: 506, Ansal Majestic Tower, G Block, Vikas Puri,

briefDescription: Diya India Foundation is a ray of hope for less fortunate by providing education, healthcare, life support and community development. Diya India is working under the guidance of Padmashree ( Prof) Dr S.C Manchanda, Sr. Consultant Cardiologist, Sir Ganga Ram Hospital. Diya India has been impactfully working towards its goal, with a belief in the importance of education and healthcare for all.
